TopicTitle: The Asteroid Sentinels: A KSP Graphic Novel (Series 8 Episode 10: Finale!)

Articles.Content: ![tgmeDB0.png](http://imgur.com/tgmeDB0.png)![PIYqUrQ.png](http://imgur.com/PIYqUrQ.png)![PyLhjLF.png](http://imgur.com/PyLhjLF.png)![fpFyCVw.png](http://imgur.com/fpFyCVw.png)![PislTFo.png](http://imgur.com/PislTFo.png)
A sneak peek of the next episode, anyone care to guess why the Mothership is burning?![BB4r653.png](http://imgur.com/BB4r653.png)

![w8xoZpm.png](http://imgur.com/w8xoZpm.png)![2TS3gpF.png](http://imgur.com/2TS3gpF.png)![marylgi.png](http://imgur.com/marylgi.png)![WaPWi7n.png](http://imgur.com/WaPWi7n.png)![8Hm2l6m.png](http://imgur.com/8Hm2l6m.png)Please leave feedback on this series!

The final approach of the first batch of Asteroid Destroyers is here! Hope you enjoy!

![thNveRO.png](http://imgur.com/thNveRO.png)![sgS5uHl.png](http://imgur.com/sgS5uHl.png)![n0aWpgi.png](http://imgur.com/n0aWpgi.png)![QmH7hgX.png](http://imgur.com/QmH7hgX.png)![O5mGxJi.png](http://imgur.com/O5mGxJi.png)

Thanks for reading! Tell me what you think of this series! I'd love some feedback for the series, it would be a great boost!

Where did you get the nuclear warheads, anyway?

It never occurred to me that <abbr title="Kerbal Inventory System (mod)">KIS</abbr> explosives could destroy buildings. Hm...

> 
> 
> 28 minutes ago, rlin said:
> 
> 
> Where did you get the nuclear warheads, anyway?
> 
> 
> 
> 
> It never occurred to me that <abbr title="Kerbal Inventory System (mod)">KIS</abbr> explosives could destroy buildings. Hm...
> 

Actually I haven't actually tested the explosive powers of the <abbr title="Kerbal Inventory System (mod)">KIS</abbr> explosives involving <abbr title="Kerbal Space Center">KSC</abbr> buildings yet... The <abbr title="Kerbal Inventory System (mod)">KIS</abbr> explosive was simply rather conveniently sized for "filming" purposes. 

The nuclear warheads are from the mod North Kerbin Dynamics.

In other news, I somewhat fear that I may not be able to exactly demonstrate a potential destruction of the asteroid—1.2.0 freezes when I encounter it, and 1.0.5 (the one where I can actually use Kerbpaint) seems quite broken, with the game refusing to load the 1.2.0 version that I've been using recently, and any rockets that reach ~10 kilometers flip out of control and the camera stops following the ship. 

**Edited <time datetime="2017-03-04T01:10:09Z" title="03/04/2017 01:10  AM" data-short="7 yr">March 4, 2017</time> by SaturnianBlue**
I've finished writing the next episode, and I've even got most of the scenes done! ![VmT8hR3.png](http://imgur.com/VmT8hR3.png)

Here we go with the Seventh episode and this is going to be a big episode! Here we go!

What do you think happens next? Please tell me what you think! Thanks for reading!

I'm hoping for big boom. However, those MIRVs are very hard to work with.

They worked during testing, but whether they work in practice... I'm not too sure...

It's a little ironic how Mortimer is such a passionate supporter against the RDF yet does things not much different from the RDF itself...
![l1AxG0s.png](http://imgur.com/l1AxG0s.png)![4qldH3a.png](http://imgur.com/4qldH3a.png)![jRtCTyf.png](http://imgur.com/jRtCTyf.png)![asC38qR.png](http://imgur.com/asC38qR.png)
Just finished the penultimate episode's script, it'll be a good 7 pages long! As for the Series 8 so far, what's been your thoughts on it?

Finished taking the screenshots on this big episode, though I may need to draw a couple things. Here's a teaser pic!![MO7ayoC.png](http://imgur.com/MO7ayoC.png)

Leave feedback to tell me what you think of the series and what I could improve.

That was great!!!  I think my favorite part was the hand drawn "fix"... that was so Kerbal!!!  ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif ":D")

That's exactly how I saw it. Bill frantically drawing lines... 

*"...just do this... then this... then this.... sure, it'll work!!!"*  ![:rolleyes:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_rolleyes.gif ":rolleyes:")

Sneak peak of the finale episode, whose script I have now completed! In this shot you can figure where this probe is going, what happened to the nukes, and more! (It's a nice little puzzle, see if you can find some details!)
I'm secretly hoping that the debris (discarded warheads and fuel tanks, along with pieces of the asteroid) will hit Barbarry's house and RDF HQ.

I'm sure our dear kerbal Mortimer will manage to work through the err... Mortifying paperwork.

The wild ride comes to an end with this finale episode of The Asteroid Sentinels! 

![Z08TrSh.png](http://imgur.com/Z08TrSh.png)![iNCdQa3.png](http://imgur.com/iNCdQa3.png)![xQWwVEm.png](http://imgur.com/xQWwVEm.png)![pLQuAXR.png](http://imgur.com/pLQuAXR.png)![CXlC0BI.png](http://imgur.com/CXlC0BI.png)![OMl5FG5.png](http://imgur.com/OMl5FG5.png)![ZILQnD7.png](http://imgur.com/ZILQnD7.png)I thank each and everyone of you who've given this graphic novel a try! The Asteroid Sentinels was once planned to be a short little comic based on the Asteroid Day mod and it became so much larger! This was a great series for me to learn how to write a story!

I'd like to give a shoutout to [@Kuzzter](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/111501-kuzzter/) for the great stories that made me try out a comic for this story, and for being both a source of great inspiration and feedback! I'd also like to thank [@Just Jim](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/148725-just-jim/) and [@insert_name](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/150339-insert_name/) for being great readers who've stuck around to read a lot of my recent stories! 

I also thank everyone at the [Thread for Writers](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/topic/119356-a-thread-for-writers-to-talk-about-writing/&page=34) thread for being a source of inspiration and tips! Lastly, I'd like to  thank the mod-makers of the mods I used—this story would not be complete without them!

Thanks everyone for reading, I hope to see you all in the next story!
